pullRequest.title: Cb 9438 2
pullRequest.bodyText: See detailed description in the commit message.

commit.message: CB-9438 Modify shared vpc support for SRE to enable it and QA team can start the rampup in their project. Now the subnet and network related info coming based on the shared account parameter.

beforeCommit.message: CB-9440 Creation of new GCP datahub clusters fail because of firewall tag limits in gcp-dev-cloudbreak

afterCommit.message: CB-9440 Creation of new GCP datahub clusters fail because of firewall tag limits in gcp-dev-cloudbreak. Changed the target tags for the type parameter and in this case we are able to only use 2 target tag on the firewall rules.

nodes.bodyText:
Why should we query the subnetwor again from GCP's API?
I assume it should be in the collect set as only the only content, shouldn't it?
I think it's worth to check that the group.getSecurity() is not null here.
Can we move the lambda expression into a separated method?
Can we have a few unit tests for the replace logic?
